title: BRIEF-Goodyear Tire Expects Strong Demand In Replacement Businesses
text:
February 8, 2018 / 4:06 PM / in 8 minutes BRIEF-Goodyear Tire Expects Strong Demand In Replacement Businesses Reuters Staff 1 Min Read 
Feb 8 (Reuters) - Goodyear Tire & Rubber Co: 
* CONTINUE TO EXPECT STRONG DEMAND IN REPLACEMENT BUSINESSES, SPECIFICALLY IN LARGER RIM SIZES - CEO ON CONF CALL‍​ 
* SEES TIRE VOLUME GROWTH OF ABOUT 3 PERCENT FOR 2018 - CONF CALL‍​ 
* SEES 2018 RAW MATERIAL COSTS TO BE ABOUT FLAT, WITH ABOUT $105 MILLION NET HEADWIND IN Q1 - CONF CALL‍​ 
* SEES VOLUME ABOUT FLAT IN Q1 DRIVEN BY DECLINES IN OE IN THE U.S. AND IN EMEA - CONF CALL‍​ 
* GOODYEAR -“LOOKING AHEAD IN AN ENVIRONMENT WHERE RAW MATERIALS ARE INCREASING, OUR EXPECTATION IS THAT WE WILL ALSO OFFSET THOSE HEADWINDS WITH PRICE” ‍​ Further company coverage:
